Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <miketout> This would have to be after PBaaS, I believe, but it would be nice to see an ultralight protocol that was compatible and could benefit from notaries, but work either way

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Oink> I think it's a good plan to give the choice to the creators of the PBaaS chains if they want to sacrifice (a part of) decentralization for the ability to have faster notarizations and access to the nSPV clients.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Oink> But I fully understand too that we shouldn't expect it in the release of PBaaS on the mainnet. Remains to be seen if Komodo has that implemented by then.

Content:
[dscrdvrsc] <miketout> @LB what's the issue?
@bimagets best miners right now are CPUs, like AMD Ryzen R5s or R7s or others, and FPGAs. GPUs aren't fast enough yet to make a profit. That may change with PBaaS, but you should always do better on CPUs and FPGAs.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <miketout> @Crabby Paddy I don't believe we added ODA, and I don't think anyone knows anything about it

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <miketout> it is not on the list to add, and it was a surprise to see the PR. we have not heard about it and really need to get PBaaS done as the priority. If there is some reason to believe it must get in before, please talk to @michaeltoutjr . Right now, we are only planning to add DP and Hemp Coin before PBaaS.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <miketout> thanks everyone for all the kind words towards devs and others contributing on a regular basis. I would also thank many of the people here who have contributed to helping us build a strong supportive community or in the case of @Oliver Westbrook and others, doing great work on development like VerusPay and web tools for Verus. We are trying now to focus on getting finished with PBaaS, as there is a Komodo hard fork in mid July, which we had hoped to upgrade alongside and are not going to, at least partially due to the extra work from the wallet and new coins. That will cost the foundation some amount of Verus directly to maintain uninterrupted notarization and we are not looking for any new work to add before PBaaS is complete. We want to have the PBaaS hard fork as soon after Komodo's fork as possible, and there is still work to be done. Devs may remain a bit scarce on the channels until after that, but we all try to check in and help periodically.
